original: intros pl0 pl1 n plp0 plp1 incl0 len0 incl1 len1. unfold pl_path_incl in incl0. unfold pl_path_incl in incl1. induction pl0 as [|a0 b0 IHb0] using pl_path_ind; intros. - simpl. inversion len0. - induction pl1 as [|a1 b1 IHb1]. + simpl. inversion len1. + simpl. apply pl_path_incl_cons. * inversion incl0; subst. apply pl_path_incl_next; auto. * apply IHb0; try auto. inversion len0; auto. * inversion incl1; subst. apply pl_path_incl_next; auto. * apply IHb1; try auto. inversion len1; auto.
